Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 1:00 PM ADT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
